definitions.text: a person who is stranded (as on an island)
examples: when the tide came in I was a maroon out there

definitions.text: a dark purplish-red to dark brownish-red color
an exploding firework used as a warning signal
leave stranded or isolated with little hope of rescue
leave stranded on a desert island without resources
examples: The mutinous sailors were marooned on an island

definitions.text: of dark brownish to purplish red
